assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Fujimori Kogyo Co., Ltd. provides packaging materials, medical/pharmaceutical packaging materials, and materials for the functional fields in Japan and internationally. It operates through Wellness, Environmental Solutions, Electronic Materials, and Building Materials segments. The company offers wellness products, including BioPhas, a customized service for biopharmaceuticals manufacturing; Total Thrombus formation Analysis System; MediTect IV Bag premix bags, etc. It also provides environmental solutions, such as flexible refill pouches; Cubtainer and Z-tainer liquid containers; tap pouches, etc. In addition, it offers protective films; coating commissioned processing services, etc. Further, it provides building and civil engineering materials. The company offers its products under the ZACROS brand name. Fujimori Kogyo Co., Ltd. was founded in 1914 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
